pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Implementation of Bat Algorithm in R // A nature-inspired metaheuristic algorithm based on the echolocation behavior of microbats that uses frequency tuning to optimize problems in both continuous and discrete dimensions. This R package makes it easy to implement the standard bat algorithm on any user- supplied function. The algorithm was first developed by Xin-She Yang in 2010 (DOI:10.1007/978-3-642-12538-6_6, DOI:10.1109/CINTI.2014.7028669).
